name: CMAttitude
desc: The deviceâ€™s orientation relative to a known frame of reference at a point in time.

items.name: var roll: Double
items.desc: The roll of the device, in radians.

items.name: var pitch: Double
items.desc: The pitch of the device, in radians.

items.name: var yaw: Double
items.desc: The yaw of the device, in radians.

items.name: var rotationMatrix: CMRotationMatrix
items.desc: Returns a rotation matrix representing the device's attitude.

items.name: struct CMRotationMatrix
items.desc: The type of a structure representing a rotation matrix.

items.name: var quaternion: CMQuaternion
items.desc: Returns a quaternion representing the device's attitude.

items.name: struct CMQuaternion
items.desc: The type for a quaternion representing a measurement of attitude.

items.name: func multiply(byInverseOf: CMAttitude)
items.desc: Yields the change in attitude given a specific attitude.
